Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a plant that is healthy because it has enough water and light.
The student can illustrate a plant that is wilted or not growing well because it lacks water.
The student can illustrate a plant that is not growing well or is no longer alive because it lacks light.
The student can show the difference between plants that have enough water and light and those that do not.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing that plants need both water and light to live and grow.
